channel.title: Shop help in 508

item.title: Shop help in 508
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

ok in my 508 i add the shops the only problem if u right click it and go to trade it doesnt work it only works when u do right click it and go to talk plz help

this is the code im using

if(pnp.npcType == #)
{
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = #;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop#, p.shop#n);
p.frames.setString(p, "Name of shop", 278, 88);
}

Read full topic
